page.title: 11PLAYGROUND GAMES FOR INFANTS
page.content: {Sidley infants}hardly ever play singing games but some girls like Hokey-Cokey if a grownup starts them. Often the boys play different games from the girls, but everybody enjoys {chasing games,}like{"What's the time {Mr. Wolf?", "Stuck in the mud" and {"Kiss_chase". Television}gives lots of {ideas for games}such as Street Hawk, A Team and Star Wars. Girls like playing My Little Pony and Supergirl. Usually the boys play{marbles}in Springtime and{Conkers}in Autumn. The girls like {skipping games}such as "Teddy Bear" and "Bumpercar." When weather permits games on the field, the girls enjoy handstands and cartwheels while the boys kick balls about. They do play some{games {together like "Catch, Sleeping Tiger, {or Pom Pom."}Children don't always play a game, sometimes they just chat.
